mapper.select: SELECT PNU ,BJD_CD ,BJD_NM ,JIBUN ,CASE WHEN INSTR(JIBUN, '-', 1, 1) > 0 THEN SUBSTR(JIBUN, 0, INSTR(JIBUN, '-', 1, 1)) ELSE JIBUN END AS BULD_MNNM ,CASE WHEN INSTR(JIBUN, '-', 1, 1) > 0 THEN SUBSTR(JIBUN, INSTR(JIBUN, '-', 1, 1)) ELSE '' END AS BULD_SLNO ,LEDG_GBN_CD ,LEDG_GBN ,JIMOK_CD ,JIMOK_NM ,PAREA ,OWN_GBN_CD ,OWN_GBN ,SHR_CNT ,SCALE_CD ,SCALE ,DATA_YMD FROM ABPM_LAND_FRST_LEDG WHERE PNU = #{pnuCode}
SELECT PNU ,BJD_CD ,BJD_NM ,LEDG_GBN_CD ,LEDG_GBN ,JIBUN ,BASE_YEAR ,STMDT ,JIGA ,JIGA_YMD ,STD_YN ,DATA_YMD FROM APMM_NV_JIGA_MNG WHERE PNU = #{pnu}

SELECT PNU ,BJD_CD ,BJD_NM ,LEDG_GBN_CD ,LEDG_GBN ,JIBUN ,PJJI_SEQNO ,BASE_YEAR ,BSIN_AREA ,JIMOK_CD ,JIMOK_NM ,ACTL_JIMOK_CD ,ACTL_JIMOK ,PAREA ,SPFC1 ,SPFC1_NM ,SPFC2 ,SPFC2_NM ,SPCFC1 ,SPCFC1_NM ,SPCFC2 ,SPCFC2_NM ,CFLT_RT ,LAND_USE ,LAND_USE_NM ,GEO_HL ,GEO_HL_NM ,GEO_FORM ,GEO_FORM_NM ,ROAD_SIDE ,ROAD_SIDE_NM ,ROAD_DIST ,ROAD_DIST_NM ,PNILP ,OWN_GBN ,OWN_GBN_NM ,OWN_TYPE ,OWN_TYPE_NM ,DATA_YMD FROM APMM_NV_PJJI WHERE PNU = #{pnu}
SELECT PNU ,SHR_SEQNO ,BJD_CD ,BJD_NM ,JIBUN ,LEDG_GBN_CD ,LEDG_GBN ,OWN_GBN ,OWN_GBN_NM ,DATA_YMD FROM ABPD_SHR_YMB WHERE PNU = #{pnu}

SELECT PNU ,BJD_CD ,BJD_NM ,LEDG_GBN_CD ,LEDG_GBN ,JIBUN ,BILD_REGSTR_UNQNO ,BASE_YEAR ,STMDT ,DONG_CD ,DONG_NM ,LNDBUK_AREA ,CALC_LAREA ,HPRC_GAREA ,RES_AREA ,POTVALE ,PJJI_YN ,DATA_YMD FROM APMM_HP_PRC_MNG WHERE PNU = #{pnu} ORDER BY BASE_YEAR DESC, STMDT

SELECT PNU ,BJD_CD ,BJD_NM ,LEDG_GBN_CD ,LEDG_GBN ,JIBUN ,BASE_YEAR ,STMDT ,APT_CODE ,APT_TYPE ,APT_TYPE_NM ,SPLOT_NM ,APT_NM ,DONG_NM ,FRL_NM ,HO_NM ,PRIV_AREA ,NOTICE_AMT ,DATA_YMD FROM CO_AP_PRC WHERE PNU = #{pnu} ORDER BY BASE_YEAR DESC, STMDT

SELECT BLDRGST_PK FROM DJRBLDRGST WHERE SGG_CD = SUBSTR(#{pnu}, 1, 5) AND (BJD_CD = SUBSTR(#{pnu}, 6, 5) OR NA_BJD_CD = SUBSTR(#{pnu}, 6, 5)) AND REPR_GB_CD = SUBSTR(#{pnu}, 11, 1) AND BUN = SUBSTR(#{pnu}, 12, 4) AND JI = SUBSTR(#{pnu}, 16, 4)

SELECT BLDRGST_PK ,UPPER_BLDRGST_PK ,REGSTR_GB_CD ,REGSTR_GB_NM ,REGSTR_KIND_CD ,REGSTR_KIND_NM ,PLAT_LOC ,RD_PLAT_LOC ,BLD_NM ,SGG_CD ,BJD_CD ,REPR_GB_CD ,BUN ,JI ,SPLOT_NM ,BLOCK ,LOT ,BYLOT_CNT ,NA_ROAD_CD ,NA_BJD_CD ,NA_UGRND_CD ,NA_MAIN_BUN ,NA_SUB_BUN ,RGN_CD ,JIGU_CD ,ZONE_CD ,RGN_NM ,JIGU_NM ,ZONE_NM ,CRT_YMD FROM DJRBLDRGST WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}

SELECT BLDRGST_PK ,REGSTR_GB_CD ,REGSTR_GB_NM ,REGSTR_KIND_CD ,REGSTR_KIND_NM ,NEW_OLD_REGSTR_GB_CD ,NEW_OLD_REGSTR_GB_NM ,PLAT_LOC ,RD_PLAT_LOC ,BLD_NM ,SGG_CD ,BJD_CD ,REPR_GB_CD ,BUN ,JI ,SPLOT_NM ,BLOCK ,LOT ,BYLOT_CNT ,NA_ROAD_CD ,NA_BJD_CD ,NA_UGRND_CD ,NA_MAIN_BUN ,NA_SUB_BUN ,PLAT_AREA ,ARCH_AREA ,BC_RAT ,TOTAREA ,VL_RAT_ESTM_TOTAREA ,VL_RAT ,MAIN_PURPS_CD ,MAIN_PURPS_NM ,ETC_PURPS ,HHLD_CNT ,FMLY_CNT ,MAIN_BLD_CNT ,ATCH_BLD_CNT ,ATCH_BLD_AREA ,TOT_PKNG_CNT ,INDR_MECH_UTCNT ,INDR_MECH_AREA ,OUDR_MECH_UTCNT ,OUDR_MECH_AREA ,INDR_AUTO_UTCNT ,INDR_AUTO_AREA ,OUDR_AUTO_UTCNT ,OUDR_AUTO_AREA ,PMSNO_YMD ,STCNS_DAY ,USEAPR_DAY ,PMSNO_YEAR ,PMSNO_KIK_CD ,PMSNO_KIK_NM ,PMSNO_GB_CD ,PMSNO_GB_NM ,HO_CNT ,ENGY_EFF_GRADE ,ENGY_RDC_RATE ,ENGY_EPI_SCORE ,ENV_BLDG_GRADE ,ENV_BLDG_SCORE ,INTL_BLDG_GRADE ,INTL_BLDG_SCORE ,CRT_YMD FROM DJRRECAPTITLE WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}

SELECT BLDRGST_PK ,REGSTR_GB_CD ,REGSTR_GB_NM ,REGSTR_KIND_CD ,REGSTR_KIND_NM ,PLAT_LOC ,RD_PLAT_LOC ,BLD_NM ,SGG_CD ,BJD_CD ,REPR_GB_CD ,BUN ,JI ,SPLOT_NM ,BLOCK ,LOT ,BYLOT_CNT ,NA_ROAD_CD ,NA_BJD_CD ,NA_UGRND_CD ,NA_MAIN_BUN ,NA_SUB_BUN ,DONG_NM ,MAIN_ATCH_GB_CD ,MAIN_ATCH_GB_NM ,PLAT_AREA ,ARCH_AREA ,BC_RAT ,TOTAREA ,VL_RAT_ESTM_TOTAREA ,VL_RAT ,STRCT_CD ,STRCT_NM ,ETC_STRCT ,MAIN_PURPS_CD ,MAIN_PURPS_NM ,ETC_PURPS ,ROOF_CD ,ROOF_NM ,ETC_ROOF ,HHLD_CNT ,FMLY_CNT ,HEIT ,GRND_FLR_CNT ,UGRND_FLR_CNT ,RIDE_USE_ELVT_CNT ,EMGEN_USE_ELVT_CNT ,ATCH_BLD_CNT ,ATCH_BLD_AREA ,TOT_DONG_TOTAREA ,INDR_MECH_UTCNT ,INDR_MECH_AREA ,OUDR_MECH_UTCNT ,OUDR_MECH_AREA ,INDR_AUTO_UTCNT ,INDR_AUTO_AREA ,OUDR_AUTO_UTCNT ,OUDR_AUTO_AREA ,PMSNO_YMD ,STCNS_DAY ,USEAPR_DAY ,PMSNO_YEAR ,PMSNO_KIK_CD ,PMSNO_KIK_NM ,PMSNO_GB_CD ,PMSNO_GB_NM ,HO_CNT ,ENGY_EFF_GRADE ,ENGY_RDC_RATE ,ENGY_EPI_SCORE ,ENV_BLDG_GRADE ,ENV_BLDG_SOCRE ,INTL_BLDG_GRADE ,INTL_BLDG_SOCRE ,CRT_YMD ,ERS_YN ,ERS_CAPA FROM DJRTITLE WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}

SELECT BLDRGST_PK ,PLAT_LOC ,RD_PLAT_LOC ,BLD_NM ,SGG_CD ,BJD_CD ,REPR_GB_CD ,BUN ,JI ,SPLOT_NM ,BLOCK ,LOT ,NA_ROAD_CD ,NA_BJD_CD ,NA_UGRND_CD ,NA_MAIN_BUN ,NA_SUB_BUN ,DONG_NM ,FLR_GB_CD ,FLR_GB_NM ,FLR_NO ,FLR_NO_NM ,STRCT_CD ,STRCT_NM ,ETC_STRCT ,MAIN_PURPS_CD ,MAIN_PURPS_NM ,ETC_PURPS ,PAREA ,MAIN_ATCH_GB_CD ,MAIN_ATCH_GB_NM ,AREA_EXCT_YN ,CRT_YMD FROM DJRFLROULN WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}

SELECT BLDRGST_PK ,REGSTR_GB_CD ,REGSTR_GB_NM ,REGSTR_KIND_CD ,REGSTR_KIND_NM ,PLAT_LOC ,RD_PLAT_LOC ,BLD_NM ,SGG_CD ,BJD_CD ,REPR_GB_CD ,BUN ,JI ,SPLOT_NM ,BLOCK ,LOT ,NA_ROAD_CD ,NA_BJD_CD ,NA_UGRND_CD ,NA_MAIN_BUN ,NA_SUB_BUN ,DONG_NM ,HO_NM ,FLR_GB_CD ,FLR_GB_NM ,FLR_NO ,CRT_YMD FROM DJREXPOS WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}

SELECT BLDRGST_PK ,REGSTR_GB_CD ,REGSTR_GB_NM ,REGSTR_KIND_CD ,REGSTR_KIND_NM ,PLAT_LOC ,RD_PLAT_LOC ,BLD_NM ,SGG_CD ,BJD_CD ,REPR_GB_CD ,BUN ,JI ,SPLOT_NM ,BLOCK ,LOT ,NA_ROAD_CD ,NA_BJD_CD ,NA_UGRND_CD ,NA_MAIN_BUN ,NA_SUB_BUN ,DONG_NM ,HO_NM ,FLR_GB_CD ,FLR_GB_NM ,FLR_NO ,EXPOS_PUBUSE_GB_CD ,EXPOS_PUBUSE_GB_NM ,MAIN_ATCH_GB_CD ,MAIN_ATCH_GB_NM ,FLR_NO_NM ,STRCT_CD ,STRCT_NM ,ETC_STRCT ,MAIN_PURPS_CD ,MAIN_PURPS_NM ,ETC_PURPS ,PAREA ,CRT_YMD FROM DJREPOSPUBUSEAREA WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}

SELECT BLDRGST_PK ,REGSTR_GB_CD ,REGSTR_GB_NM ,REGSTR_KIND_CD ,REGSTR_KIND_NM ,PLAT_LOC ,RD_PLAT_LOC ,BLD_NM ,SGG_CD ,BJD_CD ,REPR_GB_CD ,BUN ,JI ,SPLOT_NM ,BLOCK ,LOT ,NA_ROAD_CD ,NA_BJD_CD ,NA_UGRND_CD ,NA_MAIN_BUN ,NA_SUB_BUN ,ATCH_REGSTR_GB_CD ,ATCH_REGSTR_GB_NM ,ATCH_SGG_CD ,ATCH_BJD_CD ,ATCH_LAND_GB_CD ,ATCH_BUN ,ATCH_JIBUN ,ATCH_SPC_JIBUN ,ATCH_BLOCK ,ATCH_LOT ,ATCH_ETC_JIBUN ,CRT_YMD FROM DJRATCHJIBUN WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}

SELECT BLDRGST_PK ,REGSTR_GB_CD ,REGSTR_GB_NM ,REGSTR_KIND_CD ,REGSTR_KIND_NM ,PLAT_LOC ,RD_PLAT_LOC ,BLD_NM ,SGG_CD ,BJD_CD ,REPR_GB_CD ,BUN ,JI ,SPLOT_NM ,BLOCK ,LOT ,NA_ROAD_CD ,NA_BJD_CD ,NA_UGRND_CD ,NA_MAIN_BUN ,NA_SUB_BUN ,MODE_CD ,MODE_NM ,ETC_MODE ,UNIT_GB_CD ,UNIT_GB_NM ,CAPA_PSPER ,CAPA_LUBE ,CRT_YMD FROM DJRWCLF WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}

SELECT BLDRGST_PK ,PLAT_LOC ,RD_PLAT_LOC ,SGG_CD ,BJD_CD ,REPR_GB_CD ,BUN ,JI ,SPLOT_NM ,BLOCK ,LOT ,JIJIGU_GB_CD ,JIJIGU_GB_NM ,JIJIGU_CD ,JIJIGU_NM ,REPR_YN ,ETC_JIJIGU ,CRT_YMD FROM DJRJIJIGU WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}

SELECT BLDRGST_PK ,SGG_CD ,SGG_NM ,BJD_CD ,BJD_NM ,REPR_GB_CD ,REPR_GB_NM ,BUN ,JI ,SPLOT_NM ,BLOCK ,LOT ,NA_LAND_LOC ,NA_ROAD_CD ,NA_BJD_CD ,NA_UGRND_CD ,NA_UGRND_NM ,NA_MAIN_BUN ,NA_SUB_BUN ,REGSTR_GB_CD ,CMPRS_GB_NM ,REGSTR_KIND_CD ,REGSTR_KIND_NM ,BLD_NM ,DONG_NM ,HO_NM ,PAREA ,OWN_GBN_CD ,OWN_GBN_NM ,CHANG_CAUS_DAY FROM DJROWNR WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk}

SELECT BLDRGST_PK ,REGSTR_GB_CD ,REGSTR_GB_NM ,REGSTR_KIND_CD ,REGSTR_KIND_NM ,PLAT_LOC ,RD_PLAT_LOC ,BLD_NM ,SGG_CD ,BJD_CD ,REPR_GB_CD ,BUN ,JI ,SPLOT_NM ,BLOCK ,LOT ,BYLOT_CNT ,NA_ROAD_CD ,NA_BJD_CD ,NA_UGRND_CD ,NA_MAIN_BUN ,NA_SUB_BUN ,BASE_YMD ,POTVALE ,CRT_YMD FROM DJRPRICE WHERE BLDRGST_PK = #{bldrgstPk} ORDER BY BASE_YEAR DESC, STMDT
